authors_or_editors: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
citation.title: Water Quality Management and Control of Water Pollution

policy.title: Water Quality Management and Control of Water Pollution

source.name: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
source.description: The Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) of the United Nations is an intergovernmental organization whose mission is to achieve food security, ensuring that people have regular access to enough high-quality food to lead active, healthy lives.
